alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Haywood; Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 5:59PM CDT until May 15 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Tipton County in west Tennessee... Northern Fayette County in west Tennessee... Southeastern Lauderdale County in west Tennessee... Western Haywood County in west Tennessee... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 558 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nutbush to 11 miles southwest of Brownsville to 9 miles west of Dancyville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brownsville, Somerville, Nutbush, Dancyville, Oakland, Mason, Henning, Gallaway, Stanton, Braden, Asbury, Yum Yum, Belmont, Christmasville, Hickory Point, Taylor Chapel, Shepp, Turnpike, Meux Corner and Cotton Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
